description: The Golden Harp is an interactive adventure in which you intended to stow away on a merchant vessel bound for the New World - instead, you ended up in the hold of a pirate galley. With no other option, you agree to join the crew of The Golden Harp as they search the seas for the lost riches of Lisboa.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

In solo play mode, walk the path of Tanjiro Kamado and experience the story depicted in the anime ""Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba"" as Tanjiro fights to restore his sister Nezuko's humanity and battle the demon threat!

Play Versus mode, which allows up to 2 players to battle in offline or online 2v2 battles with any combination of characters! With simple controls and exhilarating gameplay, rise up to become the strongest of the Demon Slayers!

description: A roguelike game where you use abilities & items based on child logic to help Billy fight his nightmare. Poison bullies with a pair of Stinky Socks, set creepy toys on fire with a Magnifying Glass or make them step on some painful Pego Bricks!

description: Set 100 years before the original game, Shagster 2 is a multiplayer MMORPG set in the wild west! Yeehaw!

name: The Witch House
description: The Witch House is a Co-op Multiplayer game! Once you all download the game separately, share the name of your room with your friends to play together!

name: Graveyard Shift 2
description: It's Halloween and the local hooligans have nothing better to do than to vandalize your graveyard! You (and perhaps your boney friends) won't stand for it. Hop, Doot, and Smack your way through waves of ornery kids and their agitated parents as you try to protect your spooky home!

name: Crategun
description:
Made for the Opera GX Game Jam

Aliens are attacking oceans by flooding them with boxes. Without any connection with the center, you find yourself in the ocean, endlessly destroying tons of hazardous boxes and your only goal is to stop the flooding no matter what. The boxes contain various weapons, which you will have to figure out how to use.

Gain points by opening the blue boxes with weapons. Avoid touching the water. The difficulty increases with time. Good luck, machine!

name: Scarecrow
description: Hellish mix of adventure and top-down shooter. in the day explore a big living city… and in the night do your “work” efficiently. Best to remember - there are always consequences.

name: Majid, Smash'Em!
description: SMASH! SMASH! SMASH!

description: A sprawling adventure in the world of Vana'diel.

name: Another World
description: Another World is a 2D Adventure about a developer who gets stuck in his own game.

name: Zoo Tycoon 2032
description: A satirical take on the tycoon video game genre. Expect a wild ride.

name: The Wall
description: Artists and programmers in a get-along shirt.

name: Craft.io
description: Craft your way to the top by progressing through different tiers unlocking new items and structures to use.

name: Islander
description: An idle crafting game inspired by games such as Forager and Minecraft made in PICO-8. Use your pickaxe to mine any and all materials you can find, and craft your way off the islands.

name: Pirate island
description: Sin descripción

name: Claw
description: Slide, spin and snap to solve puzzles with your claw.

name: Ben 10/Generator Rex: Heroes United
description: Are you ready to be a part of the most heroic team in the galaxy? Ben 10 and Generator Rex join forces to battle a powerful inter-dimensional menace in this epic adventure for up to two players.

name: Crescendo
description: Furry Visual Novel

name: The Beast
description: "Freedom...is just the beginning of your Nightmare..."

name: Fight // Flight
description:
Earth Year 2952: the corsair crew of the Oblivion spaceship gets attacked by some mysterious kidnappers, but they leave behind the Captain, Ivory Joyner, who is determined to take them back; in the meantime, her Second in Command, Nathaniel Shada, is making up a plan to get everyone back on the Oblivion. Will the two of them succeed?

Fight // Flight is a short interactive novel divided in 6 chapters, with two POVs.

name: The Tail Makes the Fox: Episode 1
description: As an auditor of Hell, you're sent off to investigate a wayward governor. Where will your journey bring you?

name: Faith: Itch.io Edition
description: A pixel horror game inspired by MS-DOS, Apple II, Atari, and ZX Spectrum classics.

name: Islands
description: An interconnected puzzlescript game set on 9 islands

name: Found
description: A tiny game about finding each other.

name: Buds
description: A game about helpin each other out.

name: Heisei Pistol Show
description: Lolita-fashioned gay hitman Heart is betrayed by his ex-lover. In order to get revenge Heart and his trustful companion Pistol abandon the organization, but three of the best assassins follow in their footsteps. A colorful bittersweet story.

name: Super Mario Flash
description:
Super Mario Flash (also known and abbreviated as SMF1) is the first of two online games developed by Pouetpu and released on pouetpu.pbworks.com before the creation of Pouetpu-games site. Super Mario Flash is entirely based off of the Nintendo game "Super Mario Bros.", and also combines several features of different games such "Super Mario Bros. 3".

The main feature of this game is that includes a level editor so the players could make their own levels and share it on the forum/site so other players could test them and rate them.

name: Lurking
description: Lurking is a sound-based survival thriller, where sound is the only way you see, and they hear your fears.

name: Mighty Monsters
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Ninja Zero
description: Super-charged Prequel for the Ninja Swinging Series

name: Twin Shot
description: Dual player arrow firing action game set in an ancient cloud city

name: Adventure Time: Finn and Bones
description: Play as Finn and Mix it up in the underworld as you battle your way to save jake who has been taken by the mummy lord

name: Battle Masters
description: Sin descripción

name: Mageroom
description:
You are a mage.

A true mage, a tree wizard.

The last of your kind.

I wonder why?

You're locked in a box for a reason.

name: Broccoli Quest
description: BROCCOLI QUEST was made as an exercise in one afternoon using Mosi, a simple HTML engine created by itch user Zenzoa. In Broccoli Quest you play as a strange long-nosed man who's run out of broccoli. Features include: Giving sunglasses to a Goblin, soothing a foul-mouthed pirate, fumbling for broccoli in the dark.

name: Broccoli Quest II: The Dark Sacrament
description:
ON THE HALLOWED NIGHT OF THE HELL MOON...

Your oven is broken.

What starts as an errand merely to repair your broken oven quickly (d)evolves into a journey to prevent certain doom at the hands of a broccoli-shortage-causing cult known only as "BLOOD GUYS".
A surrealist exploration game.

name: Argentum Online
description:
THE FIRST 100% ARGENTINE MMORPG
Argentum is a multiplayer online game, where you can take on the role of a warrior, wizard, paladin and many other classes, and explore the mythical lands of Argentum.

It was born 20 years ago as a game fully developed in Argentina and then released to the community for free. The code is accessible to all, thus allowing its evolution and continuity over time.

From the hand of the original creators of the game, Argentum Online resurfaces as a commemoration of the 20 years of its origin.

name: MoHo
description:
MoHo is a Sega Dreamcast game developed by Lost Toys and published by Take 2 Interactive in 2000. It is notable for being the only exclusive Dreamcast game for the United Kingdom, despite receiving ratings from the German USK and French SELL ratings bodies and having its back cover description translated into German.

An American release under the name of Ball Breakers was planned for release in November 2000[5], but cancelled near completion; three different rips of a late prototype were leaked simultaneously in 2012.

name: Kawaii Islands
description:
Kawaii Island is a play-to-earn game.

Kawaii Islands creates a fantasy universe on the cloud for multiplayer to experience a whole set of simulation gaming including designing, building, crafting, farming, social networking. Especially, by gamifying several DeFi mechanisms, Kawaii Islands will bring players a new dimension of mixed entertainment and earning.

name: DinoRPG
description: DinoRPG was an MMORPG where the player must evolve their Dinoz in a vast, unique world. They can also fight in wars with thousands of other players.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Senna Forever
description: A homage to the legendary driver Ayrton Senna, this Expansion Pack brings an entirely new set of cars, tracks, and features to the game, inspired by Senna's career.

name: Jobmania: Eternal Dungeon
description:
Pick a Hero and a job then embarks on an eternal journey of dungeon descending.
Acquired random abilities and jobs through the journey and build your own unique play style.
How far can you go?

name: Slap the Rocks
description: Slap The Rocks is a new top-down puzzle which will push your brain to the limit. Slap rocks, avoid bushes and flee from stumps! Can you smash your way to the final level? Many levels of complexity! 20 unlocked levels to explore. You choose! Many ways to complete the same puzzle. Beautiful pixel graphics. Captivating and interesting puzzles. The controls are simple and accessible.

name: Soundsphere
description: Soundsphere is an open-source vertical scrolling rhythm game written in Lua using the love2d framework. This game supports many popular chart formats, contains many modifiers, including those that allow you to change the keymode.

name: Angelic Waves
description: An dating sim, rom-com visual novel with character development, love moments, drama and... you're dating an angel girl in secret?! Join the MC's unique love quest of choosing three girls to date, and see how you and chosen girl will grow together.

name: Feztal
description: FEZTAL is a very short game, which can be described as a fusion of FEZ and Portal. Use a combination of Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device and Gomez's unique abilities to navigate through test chambers.

name: Empire of Sin: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Miragine War
description: Strategically outmaneuver your enemy by picking the perfect soldiers to counterattack! Each unit has a specific set of strengths and weaknesses - select wisely to win the war. Fight those people who stronger than you, challenge forever!

developers.name: Shanghai Huanxi Network Technology Co. Ltd.
Shanghai Huanxi Network Technology Co. Ltd.

name: Freight Tycoon
description:
Freight Tycoon is an economic simulation game which challenges players’ management skills. It puts one into the shoes of an owner of a cargo transportation company. One has to evaluate the profitability of contracts, contact customers, and appoint drivers to deliver goods.
Office development is also an essential part of success in business. Employing and dismissing workers, buying new vehicles and keeping technical records competently.

name: Alabama Smith: Escape from Pompeii
description: Join a young archaeologist for an amazing adventure in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii. Help Alabama search for hidden clues, solve perplexing puzzles, and discover the truth about the Amulet of the Ages. Will Alabama solve the mystery before it's too late? Will Anastasia be able to save him from the eruption of Mount Vesuvius? Find out in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii Deluxe!

name: Legendary Mosaics: The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat
description: Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat invites you on a whimsical puzzle adventure. Something isn't right in the Enchanted Forest. A sinister spell has been cast by the Wicked Wizard, covering everything in eternal darkness. Team up with a cat and Dwarf duo and explore the depths of the forest! Save the fairies in Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat.

name: Fashion Season
description: Run the trendiest boutique in town with Fashion Season, a magnificent shape-matching challenge.

name: Apex Legends: Escape
description:
Danger Lies Within

Apex Legends: Escape (also known as Season 11 of Apex Legends) comes introduces Storm Point, a paradise-looking place with a lot of danger such as wild prowlers and venomous spiders. The new legend Ash is done just overseeing the games: she is ready to win them and prove she's the Apex Predator.

name: Princess Solitaire
description: Princess Solitaire sets off on a journey to the delightful Kingdom of Marderburg. A celebration of its glorious history is in full swing, but one guest was forgotten - the powerful wicked witch! Both the kingdom and the handsome prince are cursed with magical cards. Help the princess fight the evil and neutralize the witch's spells in Princess Solitaire!

name: Hidden Investigation 3: Crime Files
description: Solve one mystery after another to unravel a larger conspiracy that will lead you to your final case. But beware; it may drag you into the abyss forever!

name: Ruka
description: Ruka is a cartoon puzzle game where you play as a clumsy girl who is quite oblivious to the outside world. Maneuver through your Grandfather's manor and survive the mysteries there and find him. But be warned, not everything is as it seems!

name: Super Mario 64 HD
description:
Super Mario 64 HD was a Super Mario 64 fan remake project in Unity. It was taken down by Nintendo.
There is one complete level: Bob-omb Battlefield.

name: Rayze
description: Rayze is an FPS aim racer designed to make training your speed and precision fun. Hit a target to accelerate. Miss and you slow down. Hit a wall and die. Find the fastest route. Get to the finish line as fast as you can. Simple premise makes it easy to get into the game, while global leader boards incite competition and challenging yourself to try for a better time.

name: Halo: Reach - Anniversary Map Pack
description: Celebrating ten years of Halo, the Anniversary Map Pack comprises seven of the most popular multiplayer maps in Halo history, beautifully reimagined in high definition for Halo: Reach (note that you must have Halo: Reach to play this map pack). Six classic competitive multiplayer maps and a new Firefight mission take you back to your favorite locations from early Halo games, now with the gameplay intensity of Halo: Reach. The Anniversary Map Pack includes seven new achievements and 250 gamerscore. Developed by 343 Industries and Certain Affinity.

name: Halo: Reach - Defiant Map Pack
description: The fight for humanity’s survival rages on in three brand-new battlefields: a giant orbital station high above the burning surface of the planet, inside the forest of a military wilderness-training facility, and wrapped in the remnants of a civilian mining facility. These awesome new environments comprise 2 multiplayer maps and a Firefight mission that deliver 3 new achievements and 150 gamerscore. Developed by 343 Industries and Certain Affinity.

name: Halo: Reach - Noble Map Pack
description: The fight for humanity rages on a galactic scale. From a frozen xeno-archaeology site harboring secrets millennia old to an orbital anchor defending the stars high above planet Reach - and to mysterious places far, far beyond - Bungie's Noble Map Pack injects three new explosive environments into the multiplayer battlefield, each designed to reinforce all of Halo: Reach's vital warfronts, from small scale engagements to massive Invasion battlegrounds.

name: Fatal Fury: Mark of the Wolves
description:
Garou: Mark of the Wolves, known as Fatal Fury: Mark of the Wolves on U.S. Dreamcast, is a 1999 fighting game produced by SNK, originally for the Neo Geo system.

It is the ninth and final game in the Fatal Fury series, set ten years after the death of Geese Howard in Real Bout Fatal Fury. With the exception of Terry Bogard, the game is comprised of an entirely new cast of characters. Many of these characters reference older characters however.

name: Behind the Beyond
description:
Behind the Beyond is a point & click adventure set in a magical world of Hungarian folklore. Johnny, the youngest son of a poor man sets off to find a job, and on his way uncovers all sorts of magical mysteries in the kingdom.

The game mixes classic point & click mechanics with some RPG elements e.g. skills that can be improved, or equipment that can be changed.

name: Your Best Nightmare
description: An UNDERTALE Photoshop Flowey battle re-imagining.

name: Radio.Signal
description: A horror-themed visual novel about traversing a hospital in the dark, the creature that lurks within, and a radio.

name: P.M.P. Project Murder Party
description: Its a online game were an assassin got hunt the other players. But no one knows who the assassin is.

name: A Divine Wager
description: The gods Hades and Hermes make a bet.

name: Cutting Hedge
description: Trim your bush and satisfy your customers.

name: The Inverted Spire
description: Dark fantasy set in a brutal dystopian world.

name: Firelust
description: 2D top-down action game

name: Guess Who? Fire Emblem: Three Houses Edition!
description: An unofficial version of the popular kid's game Guess Who? Playable with friends!

name: Heaventaker
description: Holy Helltaker inspired game

name: The Recursive Dollhouse
description: The Recursive Dollhouse is a very strange game about a very strange dollhouse.

name: Exile
description:
A roughly 15 minute kinetic novel about isolation, set at the lightless ocean floor.
A work of fiction.

name: Autumn Leaves
description: Queer kids gardening and talking.

name: Spells For Sad Goths With Shitty Parents
description: You're 16, you're goth, and you just summoned a demon.

name: Merely a Regret
description: Love found amidst the brambles of failure

name: Second Puberty
description: An album of seven short games about feelings.

name: As Cold as the Grave
description: No one said dealing with the Fae would be easy

name: Slumber Party
description: A friendship & lesbian relationship visual novel

name: Generic nonbinary game
description: Are you one of THEM?

name: Trans Coming Out Simulator 2018
description: Story about me and my friend, reference from coming out simulator 2014

description: Episode 1: Where our story hides

description: Give your girlfriend the best birthday gift ever

name: Behind the Masc
description: A collection of game materials and art that reenvision masculinity

name: Yurivania 1: Uhaul of the Night
description: What does a gorgon bring on her second date?

name: They Live Here Now
description: Would you give up everything to be you?

name: Plantstead
description: 3d firstperson game about finding cute plantlings

name: From That Moment She Neglected The World
description: An immortal fairy picks up a disciple, raising the disciple so that one day the disciple may slay her and fulfill the end of a prophecy in which the immortal must either die or cause the end of the world.

name: No Stars, Only Constellations
description: This is just a short narrative game about looking up at the sky and thinking about it, while that cute guy next to you just won't shut the fuck up about space.

name: Wolf's Wool
description: An abstract visual novel about wondering what you are under the crumbling cover.

name: Not seafoam
description: a little mermaid bedtime story

name: Micro Trans Actions
description: A visual novel entirely on cardboard.

name: Rebirthday
description: My entry for the Meditations Games project. Originally appeared on 2/3/18.

name: Violeta
description: You are Mo, the cat! Be cute, listen to and advise your friends, and knock some plants over if you feel like it.

name: Bottoms Up
description: A Historic Gay Bar Tycoon.

name: You Are Bisexual
description: An interactive, barely-fictionalized memoir about not knowing you are bisexual

name: Ineffable escape
description: When in a place of infinite Darkness, do not drift apart

name: Chaotic Thinking
description: Let's picture chaos in a cool way along with Rosenrips' music.

name: Anti-binary
description: Explore your gender through three perspectives

name: Self-care for wizards
description: You're a wizard regaining strength. pet your familiar. draw a sigil. feel brave and good.

name: Life is Snot
description: Snots live for only one minute.

name: Robo-tea: 1sip!
description: A short date set after robo-tea:1cup!

name: Gender Quest
description: A bitsy game about questioning your gender

name: An Oath In Kind
description:
"An Oath in Kind" is a kinetic novel about a dethroned demon queen and the one and only knight who remained loyal after her fall.

When Claire finds her queen bleeding across the floor of a forest hollow, she swears to herself that she will fulfill her oath to see Galena to safety... even if Galena would have rather been left there in the mud.

name: Acolyte: Ascend
description: A bitsy interactive fiction game with a hint of dating sim about an acolyte and their deity reckoning with the end of the world.

name: Dawn Will Come
description:
It's dark. How long has it been dark?

Monsters prowl everywhere, supplies are scarce. Decide your tasks, carry them out, find more survivors to help, fight back the creatures that emerge from the Night. You must survive, because surely Dawn Will Come.

name: Quick-Change
description: A trans kid joins the school musical

name: Flights of Fancy
description: This paranoid fever dream of a story explores the direct consequences of a person's choice of daydreams.

name: Re-telling
description: Translate their hateful words into our love letters.

name: Zine Fair Lady
description: A game about small publications and microagressions

name: A Dream of Wargs
description: On queers and monsters

name: Wood for the Trees
description: A short adventure game, made for Ludum Dare 35

name: Super Drill Diver!
description: Help Drillary explore the sunken temple in this procedurally generated arcade platformer!

name: Zero Volt X
description: Manage your ship power distribution while avoiding thousands of bullets!

name: A western love story but with no horse
description: A roadtrip with two cowboy lovers

name: Tap Tricks
description: One button skateboard game, where each level is your own personal skate park to mess around in.

name: The Bog's Heart
description: When a mysterious cough overtakes Meg's (name changeable) childhood town and even the capital physicians can't help, she turns to her scorned great uncle's work on the mysterious creatures of the bog to find a cure. As she sets out into the mysterious bog lands with her trusted canine companion, will she be able to save her town?

name: Marty and the Eldritch Horror
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sea Serpent Simulator
description: This is the most true-to-life sea serpent simulation you will ever play.

name: Birdie Burglars
description: Save Chicky from the burglars!

description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Cauldron
description: Mix colors to brew potions!

name: This House Looks Familiar
description: A completely normal exploration game.

name: Rations, Please!
description: In this strategy game, your job is to pass out rations in a war-torn country, with hardly enough to go around. You must tell the survivors "you only get one."

name: Bumbling Builders
description: Build rickety forts to protect your little friends

name: Snow World
description: A two-button RPG made for Ludum Dare 34

name: Curse of Greed: Ultimate
description: Reach the finish if you can, there's a lot of gold before it!

name: Pluto's Tears
description: Pluto's tears -- the astronomically-sad saga of a dwarf planet

name: Noble
description: Manage the family tree of a Noble House!

name: 6-Sided Sojourn
description: A tiny adventure!

name: Body and Soul
description: Defend your body from evil spirits!

name: Heartbeat
description: Even a robot needs a heartbeat

name: General Room
description: No tactics required, just those pesky units off the board!

name: Gunwyrm
description: Action-Arcade game where mechanical snakes infinitely construct each other. Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47.

name: Ludum Creare
description: Solve programming bugs and then defeat those bugs in turn based combat

name: Delicious Letters
description: Keep the flame alive by sending the right love letters to your jealous and demanding lovers

name: Corpse Clue
description: Explore a corpse from up close

name: Zero Velocity
description: Mine your way out of the Black Hole!

name: Colossorama
description: Slay, chop and stab until your name is remembered in the Pantheon of Gladiators!

name: Grim Repair
description: Don't drown!

name: Aqua Journey
description: A game where you control a drop of water, changing its states to get to the goal.

name: Keep Me Breathing
description: Keep a plant alive long enough. Made in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 46.

name: Seven of Heart
description: You need to collect 7 hearts to advance to the next level

name: Inverted Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Typhoon Force: Storm Fighter
description: Typhoon Force: Storm Fighter is a shoot'em up where you pilot a spaceship and navigate your way through the end of the game by fighting swarms of enemies.

name: Librerama
description: A free/libre fast-paced arcade collection of mini-games.

name: Potion Notions
description: Mix potions in this ZZT adventure where not all is as it seems.

name: Kryftolike
description: Explore an infinite maze looking for treasure and hiding from monsters

name: Wormhole Warfare
description: Your tank driver is stupid.

name: Lisparuga
description: 2D Ikaruga-inspired shmup made for the Spring 2016 Lisp Game Jam

name: Rg-ft
description: RG-FT is a grayscale turn by turn danmaku-like robot game.

name: Summoning Pixel Dungeon
description: mod to Shattered Pixel Dungeon

name: Enbody
description: A stormy universe in a teacup.

name: Pocket Tactics
description: Strategy RPG Gameboy demake in 4 shades of green!

name: Planet Waves
description: Protect a small planet from invasors

name: Glyphs of the Pharaohs
description: A relaxing game of scrolls and tiles.

name: Pixelpusher
description: Delightfully simple online multiplayer action

name: Mixtape Fever
description: Fast-Paced local PvP

name: Space Valet
description: Park spacecraft for billionaires on the moon

name: Aerofoil
description: Port of Glider PRO, the classic Macintosh paper airplane game

name: Hazard Level
description: Tactical horror roguelike

name: Slippery ice
description: Some penguins try to knock each other off the map. What can be better?

name: Barn Bashers
description: Fun local multiplayer - Are you the best farmer?

name: Yogurt Royale
description: Control a slime in a multiplayer pvp platformer and be the first to catch all the bananas

name: Chain Champs
description: Chain Champs is a two-player, gravity based, fast-paced brawler!

name: Tackle Tourney Turbo
description: Fishing Free-For-All For 2-4 Players

name: Druonio
description: Multiplayer browser game in active development.

name: Definitely Real Football
description: The Beautiful Game

name: Morterra
description: "Land of Death" - A multiplayer survival sandbox browser game.

name: Badger Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: SkyOfSteel
description: Multiplayer sandbox building game in the sky

name: Galaxystrife
description: Online multiplayer space shooter.

name: Magiduel
description: Duel it out in magic-girl bullet hell!

name: Slip, Slap 'n' Quack!
description: Slap your friends and see who is the last one standing

name: Lawn & Order
description: Plant, Attack, Defend: 4 Player Garden Competition

name: Paincult
description: Sin descripción

name: Sticky Pigeons
description: Fling pigeons at your opponent's tipping car to send them crashing down the cliff!

name: Davy Jones' Locker
description: A pirate game where you have to bounce your shots off walls to hit other players.

name: Excursus
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie vs. Human
description: A split-screen local multiplayer action game.

name: Cafeworld
description: Sin descripción

name: Fork of Damocles
description: Always eat your vegetables

name: The Anything Gallery
description: Whatever you want to see... this gallery has it!

name: Valley Peaks
description: The mountains are calling! Complete routes of varying difficulty to scale summits in this wholesome yet ribbiting first-person climbing sim. Overcome obstacles, unlock upgrades, explore a mountain paradise, and get chummy with Valley Peaks’ froggy inhabitants as you climb to your heart’s content.

name: Wrong Floor
description: Do you want to be scared?

name: Lisa: The Pointless - Scholar of the Wilbur Sin Edition
description: A mod of LISA: The Pointless made as a love-letter to the game and its world. Scholar of the Wilbur Sin is an expansion mod that adds new content to every inch of the original adventure. There are new foes to face, new areas to discover, new items to trade, and new stories to enjoy. Recruit three brand new party members on your quest to traverse the wasteland and find a better place.

name: Virus: The Battle Field
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Event
description: Dead Event is a multiplayer open world class based survival game in which the player grows up as a creature. The creature will get bigger overtime and grow with interactions in-game and lose some growth on death. Become part of a player-created ecosystem. Objective is to survive, eat or be eaten..

name: Peril
description: An online multiplayer co-op escape room experience where you must use your wits, skills, and speed to escape your peril. Escape rooms include Halloween dungeon, saving Christmas, robbing a bank, escaping a zombie horde, and destroying a dungeon demon. Grab your friends and join the fun!

name: Collage
description: Three ordinary people are thrown together, and each retells events in his or her own voice in this unconventionally told, uniquely presented, and ultimately very human novella.

name: Rover Wars
description: If you are up for a casual yet spicy cocktail of action and strategy, but not planning to spend hours learning how to play, then Rover Wars might just be your thing.

name: Action Ball Deluxe
description: The breakout game with all the action of a shooter! Along with the classic breakout game play, you will face a legion of robots who will do their best to impede your progress. But, get one of the incredible gun power-ups and those robots are history! With 206 levels to explore and 8 enemy bosses to conquer, Action Ball Deluxe is a breakout like you've never seen before!

name: Pet Show Craze
description: Save a small town from big business, and primp and pamper the pet population in the process, in Pet Show Craze! Transform cuddly kittens, adoring dogs, wacky monkeys, and more into "Best in Show" contenders. Give your clients the extra touch in unique mini-games and sell squeaky toys to happy pet owners. You'll go crazy for Pet Show Craze!

name: Hidden Investigation: Who Did It?
description: Hidden Investigation - Who Did It? summons you to the scene of the crime. A cold case is haunting the police department. Assist Agent Sarah as she attempts to crack the case once and for all! Solve puzzles, find hidden objects, and interview a variety of interesting characters. Can you solve the mystery in Hidden Investigation - Who Did It?

name: Spear of Destiny: The Final Journey
description: Amid the turmoil of war, the Alliance has given Agent Walker a mission of the utmost importance – track down and destroy the mythical Spear of Destiny before a sinister enemy can use its supernatural power to turn the tide of war and conquer the world!

name: Jenny's Fish Shop
description: Turn Jenny's humble fish shop into a booming business and use the proceeds to build a spectacular aquarium in Jenny's Fish Shop. Give your fish the perfect environment and feed them and they will grow into the perfect pet for some lucky family! Your choice of adorable pet will give you a helping hand, but it's up to you to make Jenny's dreams come true. Reel in Jenny's Fish Shop!

name: Mahjong: Wolf's Stories
description: Mahjong - Wolf's Stories couples great gameplay with a moving story. Solve your way through hundreds of levels. Explore the forest and help the wolf find his cub. Play in timed mode for an extra challenge, or relaxed mode to sit back and enjoy the journey. Rescue a wolf cub and save the day in the heart-warming story of Mahjong - Wolf's Stories.

name: Holly: A Christmas Tale
description: Find toys for Santa in Holly - A Christmas Tale, a wonderful journey filled with holiday magic!

name: Alexandra Fortune: Mystery of the Lunar Archipelago
description: Rescue the missing adventurer and uncover an ancient treasure in Alexandra Fortune - Mystery of the Lunar Archipelago!

name: Flowery Vale
description: Flowery Vale is a match 3 garden fantasy where you must gather flowers for your sweetheart. Lose yourself in the stunning beauty of nature as you gather daisies, roses and more in order to decorate your girlfriend's cabin in the woods. Fill baskets with certain blossoms before time runs out, produce a set number of combos or create a certain number of explosions. There's never a dull moment as you create botanical delights to charm your beloved.

name: Eco Mahjong
description: EcoMahjong takes place in the beautiful town of Greenville. However, it's not as beautiful as it used to be. The Extracting Company Evil, Inc. has polluted the local river and land, causing Greenville to be covered in smog! The Walker family has taken it upon themselves to restore Greenville back to normal, but they need your help! Join the Walkers and restore the ecosystem in Eco Mahjong!

name: Frankenstein: The Village
description: Janet and Brad thought they were going on a peaceful holiday until an unfortunate breakdown stopped them outside Frankenstein Burg!

name: Pugovki
description: Game-pack includes six entertainment logical games: "Lines", "Corners", "Reverses", "Click-mania", "Four in a row" and "Three buttons". Novel and colorful patchwork graphics and pleasant music will bring you into the bright world having so little with household chores and drab existence. Each game has three levels of complexity and includes a detailed guide.

name: FunPack: Mums
description: Mum's lives are busy and often a little rest is well deserved.

name: Escape the past Collection
description: Stuck on this island, you have only one thing in your mind... Escape !

name: Baby Blimp
description: “Give birth to a successful factory!”

name: Hidden investigation 2: Homicide
description: Famous police detective, Agent Sarah, is on her way to investigate yet another unsolvable crime! Her journey will take her deep into a web of deceit and uncover a strange revenge plot linked to a long-forgotten case. In the world of puzzles and mystery, Sarah would have never expected to stumble into true love. Follow Sarah as she confronts incredible challenges in her latest adventure!

name: Bloodshore
description:
Bloodshore is an interactive action movie about a televised battle royale between high-profile streamers, entertainers and death row inmates. You control the fate of Nick, a washed-up actor who fights for a life-changing cash prize.

All is not what it seems in this latest season of Kill/Stream, the hottest reality TV show on the planet. Can Nick uncover the truth about Bloodshore Island before his time runs out?

name: Titan Quest Gold
description:
Discover the Courage that Turns Heroes Into Legends.
From Age of Empires co-creator Brian Sullivan and Braveheart writer Randall Wallace comes an innovative, all-new action role playing game set in ancient Greece, Egypt and Asia.

name: Alex Gordon
description: Alex Gordon is a fedora-wearing feline. Help this fabulous cat travel five dazzling game worlds as he collects coins and boxes the bad guys. Alex Gordon must explore every nook and cranny to save his sister from the cunning Monkey King. Will he find the scattered pieces of an ancient amulet before his nemesis releases his sibling? Grab your satchel and take a leap into the nocturnal wonderful world of Alex Gordon in this hissing Adventure.

name: Virtual Farm
description: Turn a small family farm into a booming success in Virtual Farm, a fun simulation that puts you in charge! Choose your crops, water your fields, and collect your produce. Then, visit the market to check the demand for your goods and set the price. Featuring eight kinds of crops to cultivate, gorgeous 3D graphics, and nearly endless fun, Virtual Farm is a special treat for everyone.

name: Sky Chasers
description: In Sky Chasers players explore a magical world in a cardboard box, starring Max. Fight against unique enemies and complete challenges to prove you are a true Sky Chaser!

name: Sally's Salon: Beauty Secrets
description: Treat yourself to Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets and catch up with your favorite beautician. She and her new sidekick François are making the town a little more beautiful, one treatment at a time - but when Sally's favorite singer Julio plans to visit the town, she finds herself caught up in a romantic adventure. See what happens in Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets.

name: Distrust: Polar Survival
description: A helicopter crash left a group of explorers stranded near an Arctic base. As they try to find a way back, all they are doing is sinking deeper into a nightmare scenario. When they sleep, they attract a terrifying force that sucks the life out of their bodies, but the longer they battle exhaustion and stay awake, the less likely they are to survive...

name: Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold
description: Get ready for adventure with Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold! Featuring introverted thinker Mortimer and spontaneous extrovert Kate, embark on an unexpected journey full of riddles and mysteries. What secrets lie written within the Book of Gold? Discover the beauty of emotion and the value of companionship in Mortimer Beckett and the Book of Gold.

name: Defense Grid Gold
description: Defense Grid Gold is a special compilation of the highly acclaimed tower defense game, Defense Grid: The Awakening, and extra packs Borderlands and Resurgence.

name: Mahjong Fortuna
description: Get to know yourself and your future by discovering this world-famous Mahjong classic!

name: Hotel Solitaire
description: Take some me-time, book yourself into Hotel Solitaire and enjoy some mental exercise!

name: Hotel Mahjong
description: You deserve some time off, don't you think? We already booked you a room in the famous Hotel Mahjong!

name: Mahjong Fortuna 2
description: Now here's a game to expand the mind... Sharpen your mind and self-knowlegde in this serene sensation!

name: Pastry Passion
description: Cook up colorful confections with passionate Parisian pattisier Henri! Help an enthusiastic confectioner to cook delicious desserts as you match 3 or more ingredients on the board to deliver the order in time.

name: Delicious: Emily's Childhood Memories
description: Join Emily and her loved ones on an emotional stroll down memory lane!

name: 100% Hidden Objects 2
description: In an exciting journey around the world, 100% Hidden Objects 2 offers you picturesque hidden-object scenes just waiting for your keen eye to spot all the clues within them. Whether you prefer to play in classic mode with a checklist, or would like to track down the objects using pictograms 100% Hidden Objects 2 provides pure hidden object fun!

name: Voyage to Fantasy: Part 1
description: The first part of a hidden object game like you’ve never played before: 135 varied and challenging levels! Fairy tales and legends are trapped in Black Holes. It's urgent! Fantasy is gradually fading out of our collective memories. Take up the challenge and embark on a Voyage to Fantasy, the most beautiful hidden object adventure game!

name: Well Balanced
description: Well Balanced is a new type of puzzle game for people love brain teasers like Sudoku. Players must calculate and adjust various weights in order to key everything in balance. Well Balanced offers up to 60 levels to improve your skills in calculation and physical comprehension. The more the accurate the calculation, the higher will be the score.

name: Biggest Little Adventure
description: See the world through a different perspective in Biggest Little Adventure, an epic journey of tiny proportions.

name: Marie Antoinette and the Disciples of Loki
description: The year is 1787 and the French monarchy is living its last years of peace. In Vienna, Mozart is just about to finish his latest opera. Far to the north, in Iceland, a tremendous volcano eruption has already changed the face of Europe forever. What is the link between those events? Join Josepha Duschek, a famous opera singer, as she investigates a mysterious crime and begins her quest for the truth. Uncover the traitorous plots surrounding Marie Antoinette, the Queen of France, and track down the suspicious disciples of Loki. Travel to the marvelous cities of Philadelphia, Versailles, Vienna, and Prague and meet famous historical characters such as Mozart, Benjamin Franklin, Jeanne of Valois, and even Marie Antoinette! Sharpen your skills through puzzles and brainteasers in this Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Battle vs. Chess
description: Commanders, assemble your armies! BATTLE vs. CHESS calls for an interactive feather duster, chartering the successful chess game principle into the present day multimedia world. Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command! As a Commander, execute skillful maneuvers on the game board and catapult yourself directly into the battle with devastating attacks, chessman vs. chessman.

name: Ted The Jumper
description: Duck into Ted the Jumper, a splash of fun! Help Ted stay high and dry by getting him across floating blocks. Use your tactical wit to collect all wooden blocks. While the mesmerizing sound of rippling water sooths your mind, obstacles will pose serious challenges. Jump forward, left and right without getting wet feet. Enjoy a colorful affair in Ted the Jumper!

name: My Puzzles
description: In this puzzle-game adapted for children from 3 to 8 years old, you will make puzzles in many universes with Fun, one of the Fun4Family's mascots!

name: Piggly
description: Have you ever seen a pig climb up a tree? Juggle apples? Perform a somersault?

name: Viking Heroes: Collector's Edition
description: The forces of evil don't stand a chance when the heroic Viking family embarks on an epic quest to save Midgard!

name: Robin Hood: Winds of Freedom - Collector’s Edition
description: Help Robin Hood and his merry men rescue King Richard from a cunning kidnapper!

name: Ramses: Rise of Empire - Collector's Edition
description: Ramses - Rise Of Empire Collector's Edition is a captivating Time Management game that will take you back to ancient Egypt. From your first hut to your final palace, raise the great civilization up from the sands of time! Turn small piles of coins into vast treasuries and pursue ambitious projects. Master strategic gameplay in Ramses - Rise Of Empire Collector's Edition today!

name: Heart's Medicine: Season One - Remastered
description: Go back to the beginning of Allison Heart's epic story to become a doctor

name: Robin Hood 3: Hail to the King - Collector's Edition
description: Join Robin Hood and his band of merry companions on a thrilling quest to return King Richard to the throne! From its comical campaign to its hilarious bonus chapter, players will love guiding the legendary hero as he saves Nottingham from its tenacious villain!

name: Hermes 3: Sibyls' Prophecy - Collector's Edition
description: Fight to save to the gods as they battle to retain their immortality! Filled with bizarre and fanciful creatures of legend, Hermes: Sibyls’ Prophecy is an epic adventure and a perfect escape for the young and the ageless alike.

name: Rose Riddle: The Fairytale Detective - Collector's Edition
description: Rose Riddle - The Fairy Tale Detective is a magical time management adventure. Join Rose as a rendezvous with her missing parents soon becomes an unexpected excursion to a fairy tale realm! Manage resources, race the clock, and unlock bonus content as you embark on a comical adventure. Play Rose Riddle - The Fairy Tale Detective today!

name: Twisted Lands 2: Insomniac - Collector's Edition
description: Cross the fragile boundaries of reality to find safety in Twisted Lands - Insomniac, a mind-bending thriller.

name: Moai 5: New Generation - Collector's Edition
description: Moai V: New Generation Collector's Edition is a strategic time management game that will put the power of the elements at your fingertips. Guide tribal members and draw elemental signs with your mouse cursor as you guide your village to safety. Manage resources, unlock bonus levels, and lead your tribe to victory. Play Moai V: New Generation Collector's Edition today!

name: Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom
description: Search for an ancient treasure map and discover the mystery of a terrible curse in Natalie Brooks - The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom. Search stunning scenes for hidden objects and find the ancient treasure map before it's too late. Featuring animated locations, challenging mini-games, and more, this original challenge is a stirring adventure. Join Natalie on her exciting search today!

name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 4: Collector's Edition
description: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 4 Collector's Edition is a time-tripping, time management adventure. Travel to the medieval past to face fantastical foes and solve a mystery of legends and magic. Use strategy to amass and manage precious resources as you complete quests as quickly as possible. Join Sir John on his boldest adventure yet in New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 4 Collector's Edition.

name: Viking Brothers 3: Collector's Edition
description: Ready your weapons and answer the call of the gods to save the universe from evil!

name: Stray Souls: Stolen Memories - Collector's Edition
description: Guide a mother who pursues a terrifying apparition into a twisted reality to save her daughter. As you explore a strange town in which an evil clown has turned all of the residents into wooden dolls, you'll slowly peel back the layers of a disturbing story that reveals why the mother's husband has never spoken about his past!

name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 5: Collector's Edition
description: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court V Collector's Edition takes you back into a world of knights and dragons. Join Sir John and Lady Mary as they're pulled back in time to save King Arthur from a fate worse than helmet hair! Take on magical obstacles as you manage time and resources. The fate of the kingdom lies in your hands! Enter New Yankee in King Arthur's Court V Collector's Edition today!

name: Baking Bustle: Collector's Edition
description: Bake up a storm on an epic cooking adventure that spans the world of food! Join Ashley and Scott as they tackle the culinary challenge of their lives in restaurants that serve everything from scrumptious pancakes and gourmet burgers to tasty tacos and succulent soups.

name: Fall of the New Age
description: Mankind has just got out from the dark Middle Ages. Superstitions and fears still reign the minds of the majority of people, but the germs of science and culture rapidly emerge and grow stronger. But, as it turns out, it doesn’t play into the hands of some of those in power.

name: Stalingrad
description: Stalingrad is a real-time strategy title that places gamers in the middle of the most dramatic periods of World War II, covering major events from June 1942 till January 1943. Built-up upon the enhanced Enigma Engine, the game offers faithful historical recreation of the Stalingrad area, vast tactical options and more than 150 units at your command.

name: Mary le Chef: Cooking Passion - Platinum Edition
description: Enjoy Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion Platinum Edition and meet the feisty Mary! Working at a huge law firm was exactly what her parents had planned for her - however, it doesn't make Mary happy at all... Instead, she spends her days dreaming about becoming a chef! Will she have the courage to chase her dreams and follow her heart? Play Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion Platinum Edition!

name: Maggie's Movies: Camera, Action! - Collector's Edition
description: Maggie has always loved the movies and longs to be a film director. But when she gets her big break as the assistant director on Waves of Love, a new film from Sure Shot Pictures, the producer keeps getting in the way of her dream. Susan won’t pay the hard-working crew for overtime, and they’re threatening to strike! Even worse, Susan blames Maggie for the crew’s unhappiness, so she must find a way to keep them on the set without compromising her values. And when the studio owner’s son arrives on set, Maggie needs to convince him that she can bring everything together on time and budget - or she’ll lose her job!

name: Dreamland Solitaire: Dark Prophecy - Collector’s Edition
description: Enter a world of magic in a stunning new solitaire adventure! Guide a kindhearted fairy, a noble knight and a powerful wizard as they pursue the evil witch, Jill, who intends to destroy the knight's realm and enslave its people.

name: Golden Rails: Small Town Story - Collector's Edition
description: The Old West meets the New Frontier as you build a railroad that stretches across America and fight to put a trigger-happy bandit behind bars!

name: Farm Frenzy: Refreshed - Collector's Edition
description: Slip into a pair of overalls and give us your best "Yee-haw!".

name: Merchants of the Caribbean: Collector's Edition
description: Young Englishman Jack Savvy decides to launch a trade empire in the Caribbean. However, the greedy pirate Fallen Henry stands between Savvy and his success, attacking him for his ship and resources.

name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe: Collector's Edition
description: Set off on a cross-country journey to feed the famished masses!

name: Legacy Tales: Mercy of the Gallows - Collector's Edition
description: Solve this pirate mystery to reunite two lost souls.

name: Hometown Poker Hero: Platinum Edition
description: Play Hometown Poker Hero and enjoy an amazing poker game! Jimmy's old neighbourhood has fallen on hard times after the Grimaldi Syndicate took control in town. There's only one way to save the city; by beating the Grimaldis in many challenging poker matches. Are you up for an incredible adventure?

name: Apothecarium: The Renaissance of Evil - Collector's Edition
description: The story takes place in Italy in the époque of the Renaissance. Disastrous outbreak of plague and leprosy is raving, taking thousands of lives. We play-act for Adriano, - brave and daring as hereditary aristocrat Adriano family member of the Duke of Medici, who sent for the pursuit of his daughter, Claudia. Our hunt leads us to the strangest of places – little town called Apothecarium. Just recently Italy’s brightest minds were fighting over the search of the vaccine against plague. These scientific pioneering and research so as to win the fight with the dreadful disease is the purpose this “amazing city” was built for.

name: East India Company: Gold
description:
In East India Company, players will enjoy building the World's most powerful trading empire & engaging in vigorous battles in both single-player & multiplayer modes, all within a breathtaking cinematic game environment. Starting modestly, you will build your fleet, establish connections to faraway countries, and keep the rivaling nations at bay. Choose from a wide array of ship classes, including a variety of transport and military vessels. Create diverse fleets and assign each of them specific trading routes. Control and upgrade well-situated ports as you form your strategy for domination. Conflicts and wars are inevitable. When hostile fleets engage each other, the spectacular naval battles are fought from a real-time tactical level. For greater tactical depth, command your ship and give independent orders to each of your fleets. Fight against the other European powers to create a trading empire that will rule above all others in this groundbreaking strategy war game!

East India Company Collection Gold Edition 2012 contains:
* East India Company: Designer’s Cut
* Pirate Bay Expansion Pack
* Battle of Trafalgar Expansion Pack
* Privateer Expansion Pack

name: Cathy's Crafts: Platinum Edition
description: Cathy is chasing the dreams of others instead of her own. Should she stay and run the family hardware store or join her boyfriend in New York and become an art buyer?

name: Deep Madness
description: Deep Madness is a casual game where your task is to jump as deep as possible. Will you become the best player in the leaderboard?

name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual - Platinum Edition
description: Play Taken Souls - Blood Ritual and solve a mind-bending hidden object case! Centuries ago, the worlds of Magic and Technology were divided. Years later, someone tries to reunite them. An earth shattering clash with the Keeper of the World of Magic ensues. Lives are taken and more are at stake. Will you, detective Farrell, determine the world's fate? Solve the case in Taken Souls - Blood Ritual!

name: Delicious 2
description: Bring along a recipe for success, because someone needs to turn around Emily's family's restaurant!

name: Gold Rush: Treasure Hunt
description: Dig into prospector Jack's tale and find out whether you're worthy of his secret treasure!

name: Monument Builders: Notre Dame
description: Build the greatest cathedral of all in Monument Builders - Notre Dame de Paris, a wonderful journey through architectural history. With almost 200 years in the making, the grand cathedral in Paris inspires as one of the finest examples of French Gothic architecture. Here's your chance to experience this great feat first-hand.

name: Legendary Arcane 2
description: 4-Players Plaformer Fighting Game & Solo Plaformer Adventure

name: Super Connect 4
description: 2-4 players, runs in the browser. Get 4 in a row using pieces with special abilities

name: The Tale of the Cartographer
description: A pumpkin-like mapmaker a quill and a parchment... What else do you need?

name: Soul Union
description: Psychological Fantasy : Shape the Heart and Mind

name: Deepdive
description: A short procedurally generated diving roguelike about going ever deeper into the ocean

name: A Welcome Shower
description: A little exploration of rainfall and hope. Includes sound.

name: Velocity Skytacks
description: A Fun Arcady Low Poly Split Screen Multiplayer Racing Game

name: Good Impression
description: Your mom will be there in 3mn! Clean your room- NOW!

name: Regal Tails
description: With stunning artwork and music, get lost in a world of pure furry fantasy!

name: Allocation
description: A Metroidvania without an interconnected world or character upgrades.

name: Roborazzi
description: You are a Roborazzi. Scoot on little buddy and keep that camera singing!

name: Restless Wing Syndrome
description:
In Restless Wing Syndrome, you play as a hungry pigeon scavenging the city rooftops for delicious morsels of bread. However, you were born with a condition that causes your wings to spontaneously flap, shooting you upward. Luckily, you know just how long you have between each wing spasm, thanks to your trusty Flap Meter.

Time your movements in conjunction with your flaps to cross gaps, avoid spikes, and glide across hazards to reach each delectable slice of bread in this puzzle platformer.

name: PortaBoy
description: A happy bunch of minigames! (LD41 Entry)

name: HaachamaWare
description:
HaachamaWare: The Game!
Hololive fangame inspired by WarioWare, where you participate in a lot of different mini-games with cute anime characters.

name: Rocketpult
description: Launch a rocket from a catapult and land it with skill and style!

name: Overgame
description: Funny Meta Game with Plot Twists. "The Game is a Liar"

name: Beemis: The Curse of God
description: Become a real life bee and also fight god himself. Take on many bosses and wacky levels as a young bee whose life has been drastically changed by a curse that was maniacally concocted by god.

name: A Triangle Game
description: Sin descripción

name: The Lair
description: A retro scrolling beat'em up with a dark fantasy theme.

name: Laserwave
description:
Grab your mouse...

Turn up the volume...

Let the beats flow through you!

Laserwave is a synthwave bullet-hell-like rhythmic shooter where your actions are defined by the music!

name: Hole in Clone
description: Shot clones to reach the goal!

name: Pikwip
description: Head to the summit. Local co-op or single player.

name: Five Secrets
description: That afternoon, I wanted to speak with my grandmother. We had four secret rules.

name: Paddle Force
description: Two player fast-paced pong-like with powerups set in space.

name: Server Preserver
description: Feed the servers to keep them running

name: My Legs Got Tubed
description: Your doctor just threw away your legs. Have fun! v1.6 out now!

name: Siege Physics
description: Build siege engines, launch ragdolls

name: Droid Game 3D
description: 3D online TPS shooter.

name: Roushigumi
description: A traitor threatens the Shogun in this tense shoot-em-up.

name: Bear-Truck Trucker
description: The physics bear driving stacking hauling trading game

name: A Puzzling Combination
description: Made for LD 41 ! A Puzzling Reflex based game !

name: Bully Billy
description: Inspired by Dani Dev

name: A Small World Cup
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinballvania!
description: Rotate the stage and collect all the green pickups to open up the exit. Features 20 stages and 4 bosses and includes a new game plus with reshuffled procedurally generated levels.

name: PS5 Simulator
description: Wait no more, your ultimate PS5 experience is here! Poor cable management, snacks on floor and try to not break your next-game console in this non-AAA-game!

name: Super Ness
description: Relax and have fun in this toy-like game

name: Sand Flag
description: Do not let the flags fall!

name: Blow the Hen Down
description: A game about pirates, hens, and devastating explosives!

name: Banners Begone!
description: A clicker quest of purging banners from your homepage!

name: Unitres Dreams
description: An experimental 2D platformer with a wacky aesthetic inspired by games from the Megadrive

name: Path of the Rabbit
description: Build a small world full of paths for your rabbit to follow. You can build on top of old tiles, but you can only build five tiles wide, five tiles deep and five tiles tall. Run out of water or carrots, or get stuck on the edge, and it's game over! Each time you place a tile your rabbit gets thirsty, so frequently visit oases to fill up on water. As your rabbit travels along the path, it feeds and gains carrots which are useful when fighting off foes such as foxes. Successfully fighting off three opponents levels your rabbit up and increases its maximum carrots by two. And it will need all the carrots it can get for when the boss arrives!
